actions.text: Amendment SA 2633 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2633 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 335.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2633 made in Senate.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2633.
Amendment SA 2633 proposed by Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S13104-13113, S13114-13115, S13123; text: CR S13104) To clarify treatment of outside income and expenses in the Senate.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2633 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 335.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2633 proposed by Senator Lott.

purpose: To clarify treatment of outside income and expenses in the Senate.
